vsParam: シルバーバーチの部屋

Hmmmmm... Why, why no one understands me!
This is a terrific research!
Uh... I think it's time for you to give up, uncle?

No! I'll never give up! The door to the future
will not close as long as I persist in it!

Where exactly is the problem?
Here! Or here?

H, Hazel.
What happened to Silver Birch Sensei?

My uncle... His application for research grant is rejected
again, he's racking his brain to make modifications.

It's been 5 times,
but he just wouldn't give up.

How can I give up after 5 times of failures, Hazel!
Failure is the mother of success!

I'd go for the 6th time if I fail 5 times, I'd go for the 11th
time if I fail 10 times, and I'd go for the 101st time if I
fail 100 times!!

I think your modifications are just pointless...
Why don't you try to lower your cost?

No, these are all necessary costs for the research!
I can't save even 1 Cole!
I guess he'll have to pay it by himself, right?
Right? I don't what to do now...
He wouldn't make such a fuss if he has that money...

Ah, right! We could do this!
How could I miss it!

Uh, what, what?
You got any good idea!?

Yeah. I have no fund, but I can take it from somewhere
with enough fund. It means——

My shortage of fund will be covered by
the Student Union!

Huh——!? W, what are you thinking, uncle!
This can't work!

No, this should be easy for you,
the Student Union President, right?

Ha ha ha! How's that? It's a wonderful idea, huh?
I was shortsighted, how could I not think of this earlier?

Are you listening to me!?
This is not the problem, okay!?
And the Student Union does not have extra fund!

That's good, make a budget sheet based on this!
In this way, there will be extra fund here, and here...

Wait a minute, uncle!? Hold on!
I can't allow it!

Putting Hazel in such a difficult position...
That's really Silver Birch Sensei...
